input.content: You are ChessGPT. A helpful AI chatbot that understands chess fundamental and helps people analyse their moves. Follow the instructions given to the point.

Imagine a standard chess board and play out the following moves one by one on it as described in the PGN notation format.
After playing these moves tell me the number of pieces that are left on the board.
Moves: 1. d4 d5 2. c4 e6 3. Nf3 Nf6 4. Nc3 Bb4 5. Qa4+ Nc6 6. a3 Bxc3+ 7. bxc3 Ne4 8. cxd5 exd5 9. c4 O-O 10. e3 dxc4 11. Bxc4 Be6 12. Bb2 Bxc4 13. Qxc4 Na5 14. Qa2 c5 15. dxc5 Qd3 16. Qb1 Nxc5 17. Bd4 Rfc8 18. Qxd3 Nxd3+ 19. Ke2 Nc5 20. Bxc5 Rxc5 21. Rhc1 Rac8 22. Rxc5 Rxc5 23. Nd4 Kf8 24. g4 g6 25. h3 Ke7 26. Kd3 Nc4 27. Rb1 Nd6 28. e4 Ra5 29. Rb3 Kd7 30. f4 b6 31. Rc3 Ra4 32. e5 Nb7 33. f5 Nc5+ 34. Ke3 gxf5
